description: A cigarette can lead to a lot of opportunities. For our hero, Paco, it lead to some building. See, Paco gave Dante a smoke and Dante gave Paco a dicking that will make you wonder if it was really his first time. See, Paco, being the spicy lad he is used his manpower to talk Dante into taking whatever kind of ass is available...namely his. They went back upstairs and engaged in some gymnastic type BFT action. Dante did one armed push ups while face fucking Pacos mouth and they even built a pyramid of lust. It was everything Paco promised Dante.
title: Spicey Paco
